subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Coach Guy Boucher said the 41-year-old Dwayne Roloson is “the guy that took us here,” so he will be in net for Game 6 when the Lightning try to even the best-of-seven series against the Bruins.
snippet: Coach Guy Boucher said the 41-year-old Dwayne Roloson is “the guy that took us here,” so he will be in net for Game 6 when the Lightning try to even the best-of-seven series against the Bruins.
